content:
I am a co-founder of Voxeldance company, before that I was an Algorithm Engineer working for Polydevs, with a focus on algorithms for 3D Printing applications.
My primary research area is computer graphics, with particular interests in geometric modeling, mesh processing.

title: Lawliet Wang
